subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Alas, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Phoenix Suns have, at most, two games left in what has been a thrilling, unpredictable, edgy and sometimes over-the-edge playoff series.
snippet: Alas, the Los Angeles Lakers and the Phoenix Suns have, at most, two games left in what has been a thrilling, unpredictable, edgy and sometimes over-the-edge playoff series.
